bug.author: jrc1883
bug.summary: Albums not matching actual folder structure
bug.description: Photoprism shows I have more than 13,000 folders in the albums tab. I may have when I originally imported things but I do not anymore. I went through a photo re-organizing and condensed to folders based on year only...so like 20 folders or so. I did a complete re-index in photoprism but still see >13,000 folders. How would I reconcile this?

comments.comment: Improved it, you'll need to index again (but not complete, so it should be fast). New Docker build available for testing soon!
